attributes.action: For the body that recomended 11%rise for MP's to review public sector deal of 1%
attributes.background: 5 yrs public sector has had 1% increase forced upon them. 2015 an independant body recommended an 11% pay rise for MP's, normal public sector workers have had a real term pay cut for the last 5 years and for the next 5 years to come, and no anuation in pay. we want a fair pay deal like the MP's

rejection.details:
The petition seeks action from the Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (Ipsa).  Ipsa is a body statutorily independent of Parliament and Government and therefore the UK Government and Parliament is not responsible for its work programme and cannot direct it to undertake the review which is sought.

You might wish to submit a petition calling for a Government review of 1% pay settlements in the light of the recent pay settlement for MPs.
